wordpressPage.title: Other Links
wordpressPage.content:
Useful Links

Here you will find a variety of links that just didn’t fit into any other category…but well worth looking at.

Scripture Union Holidays – Residentials for young people run by the very experience Scripture Union.

Cartoon Church – A selection of humorous cartoons and a blog from Dave Walker

ASBO Jesus – A lively blog full of funny Christian cartoons…well worth a look!

Infed.org – A website full of youth work articles focusing on current affairs in youth work but also the faith sector – ideal for people studying youth work!

The Parent Zone – Useful resources, information and tips for parents.

Springs Dance Company – A UK based dance company who do a variety of faith & dance based activities in schools and with churches and youth groups.
